entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Eskasoni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 6:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5 except zero along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
